Summary: Two red orbs,big and noiseless,fairly close.erratic movement.
divs: Sighting DetailsJust watching tv and my teenage son and his buddies came running in and yelling about some red ufos in the sky out front.The back yard is closer so i went out and sure enough i saw a large red ufo in the sky-moving to the right then stopped.Moved and stopped again and made some irregular moves as it decended below my roofline.I ran out front were the other kids had went and it was gone.They said there were two and they had video on their i-phones.Interesting footage to say the least.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Santa Rosa
There was one other sighting in Santa Rosa on or around December 31st 2012
